text:

The vibrators also have an option to turn on and off randomly in the night at different settings, giving the girls only some time to rest.

"Good morning, girls," Tsubasa greets as her employees remove them from their restraints. "I'll bet you didn't sleep well at all! Well, that's going to be an issue, considering we booked an event for the two of you tonight."

She tugs on one Totoko's pigtails, yanking back Nyaa's hair as well.

"Hope you like taking cock for hours on end, piggy and kitty," she laughs.

The rest of the night was less than peaceful for the two girls, startling awake from the lack of air or whenever they felt the vibrations in their pussies. Right. This was serious. Especially if she wanted to continue being treated marginally better than Totoko.

Totoko is completely exhausted, drooling without restraint as soon as Tsubasa even mentions cocks. It shows that she’s been tormented longer than Nyaa, searching for just a little bit of relief even if it means agreeing.
